alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wasatch...southern Morgan and southwestern Summit Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oakley, or 11 miles northeast of Park City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coalville, Kamas, Oakley, Francis, Samak, Wanship, Peoa, Hoytsville, Marion and Rockport State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 152 and 162. Utah Route 35 near mile marker 0. Mirror Lake Highway between mile markers 0 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
